insights.populationGrowth: Stable 0.4% with traditional lifestyle and border location providing some stability.
insights.educationLevel: Good 82% literacy despite rural nature due to border trade connections.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 55%, border trade 20%, government 15%, services 7%, crafts 3%.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional houses 80%, modern houses 15%, border facilities 5%.

insights.temperature: Temperate mountain climate, cold winters (0°C), mild summers (22°C). High altitude valley.
insights.precipitation: Good precipitation 1,100mm supporting agriculture and forests.
insights.seasonality: Cold winter with snow, pleasant spring/summer, clear autumn.
insights.extremeEvents: Late snowfall, hailstorms, occasional droughts, landslides.

recentEvents.impact: Potato crop planting delayed, livestock stress

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Medium - Border infrastructure provides some resources
